column1: ¡El Team Chuy dijo PRESENTE en la Marcha de Mujeres 2020!  ¡Éste es el año para detener los ataques de Trump a mujeres y a nuestras comunidades!  #WomensMarch #TodayWeMarchTomorrowWeVote⁣ #MakeItCount https://t.co/GzbTuOGk0t

#TeamChuy said PRESENTE at the Women’s March Chicago 2020! Thousands of women and men of all ages and backgrounds joined together to stand up for women’s rights and human rights. Our favorite sign was: “Feminist I am.”⁣ ⁣#WomensMarch  #MakeItCount ⁣ @womensmarchchi https://t.co/Gwmv0LWhr4

In Matamoros I met an asylum seeker who has been living in a refugee camp since September. As a single mother with no legal representation she’s had to deal with the slow court system all by herself. In a few days she will have her fourth court date. #RemainInMexico ❌ https://t.co/P4iYHRy2ji
Trabajaré duro en el Congreso para revertir la política “permanecer en México”. #RemainInMexico https://t.co/NWHQZR5w2m

Hoy escuché de familias viviendo en casas de campaña y en condiciones insalubres en #Matamoros como resultado de las políticas anti-inmigrantes de Trump. Sus historias te llegan al corazón. Hay muy poca agua comida y cuidado médico disponible. https://t.co/R4rhNVAHNt
I will work as hard as possible in Congress to overturn the #RemainInMexico policy. @ACLUTx  @TXCivilRights https://t.co/BF0fgECsLF

Today I heard from families stuck in unsafe and overcrowded camps in #Matamoros due to Trump’s anti-immigrant policies. Their stories are heartbreaking. Water food and medical care are scarce.   I’m grateful for the groups working on the ground to help people. https://t.co/RLDMrO1w95

The facts are clear: Trump extorted a foreign government to get dirt on a political opponent in exchange for $400M in US support. Congress has done its job. It is time for the Senate to do theirs. https://t.co/F2DqgKOYZN

Our fellow American brothers and sisters deserve safety and peace of mind. Any little bit helps -  learn more about their campaign and let’s show the world que #PRSeLevanta!  Help #PuertoRico here👇  https://t.co/kgiqMSZpyL
The Puerto Rican Agenda of Chicago is ready to take action and needs your help.   I just donated $5000 to their Rescue Relief Rebuild campaign.

The Trump administration is holding up $18 BILLION approved by Congress for recovery efforts in #PuertoRico. After the recent earthquakes and aftershocks thousands of people have lost their homes and countless don’t have access to water and electricity.
This week Celina & Edgar were sworn into the IL Legislature. They represent the rising generation of community leaders locally and beyond. Congratulations! https://t.co/1uV800f92w
To our volunteers THANK YOU. Your incredible work engaging voters resulted in 20000 signatures and got 6 progressive leaders a place on the ballot in 2020. https://t.co/RC0p58PaFT

Thank you for an incredible first year in Congress. Together we have advanced our communities for generations to come. On behalf of the García family I wish you a very safe and happy holiday season. https://t.co/7InwK1RHYW

I voted to impeach President Trump. It was a somber vote but it was a necessary one. The President abused his power to bribe Ukraine for his own political gain. My vote was for my constituents the integrity of our elections and to honor my duty of protecting the Constitution. https://t.co/VhLPY01Tg3

.@PPact has endorsed our 2020 re-election campaign! Planned Parenthood provides vital health care services like cancer screenings and birth control to millions of people across the country. I’m proud to #StandWithPP and I’m grateful for their support. https://t.co/pqzgeSt8TC
From my family to yours Happy Thanksgiving! 🦃🍂 https://t.co/OYqcXzjaG4
So join me on Tuesday November 26th at 6PM in Berwyn - one of the three locations - where free turkeys will be provided to families in my district. You don’t want to miss it! https://t.co/QsXTfS25Pd

During the holiday season it is important to give thanks & also to give back. Realty of Chicago sets the example every year with their Annual Turkey Giveaway and this time around is no exception. To celebrate their 7th Annual Turkey Giveaway their goal is to feed 15000 people!

I met with DACA recipients their families and allies to urge the Supreme Court to #ProtectTheDream and uphold the #DACA program. For over 700000 young people America is the only home they have ever known. We should not turn our back on them. #HomeIsHere #HereToStay https://t.co/S6XdefiBsD

Given Facebook’s bad track record of abusing private data it can’t be trusted with #Libra. That’s why I introduced the Keep Big Tech Out of Finance Act to protect your wallet and keep big tech out of banking.  https://t.co/UTqeZIZe8d

Congratulations to @CTULocal1 & @SEIU73 for reaching deals w/@ChiPubSchools. The final agreements will improve conditions for teachers and staff & better serve our kids esp. Latino & Black students. Unions continue to be vital in the struggle for justice in our education system. https://t.co/5dhe91diti

No one is above the law; not even the president. That’s why I voted to move forward with the impeachment inquiry today. Trump has abused his power jeopardized the integrity of our elections & put our national security at risk all for his political gain.  https://t.co/6DvxtfSuXW

I'm sharing a message of solidarity with all who are working hard for our children in #ChicagoPublicSchools. Our kids deserve the best education we can provide. And giving our kids the best opportunities means supporting our teachers & staff with the resources they need. https://t.co/3BR3mPMYNn
Do you have your tickets for the tailgate this Saturday yet?  Tamborazo & Taquiza & Drinks. See you there!🍺🎶🌮⚾️  RSVP ➡️ https://t.co/wJzc3GBhJM https://t.co/oTiJsu0cFA

Tonight the Democratic Party of Illinois is coming to the southwest side to inform people how to become a delegate to the 2020 Democratic Convention in MKE. This is an important step in the process of selecting our next President. https://t.co/iFIqzye6Gy   https://t.co/9mRfgQEWyz

Join me & friends for a White Sox Tailgate. We will have a LIVE Tamborazo band and a Taquiza. In case you were wondering--I'm still a Cubs fan. My son is a huge White Sox fan so I get a pass.😃🎉🎷🎶🍻🌮⚾️  Tickets➡️ https://t.co/wJzc3GBhJM https://t.co/DgBH7IhASn

I met @adybarkan through his work with Local Progress. He’s a tireless advocate for #MedicareForAll despite his health battles. ALS may have taken Ady's ability to speak but not his powerful voice. I'm inspired by his book #EyesToTheWind and you will be too. https://t.co/OtYMcydshj

Do you have your karaoke song ready yet? I do.  Join me TOMORROW Thursday September 5th for a community fundraiser at @RevBrewChicago featuring @tpskaraoke     Cheers! 🍻🍻  RSVP ➡️ at https://t.co/8Dbtz2M38x  #chuyforcongress https://t.co/hNquL9JFtv

Beer + revolution= a match made in heaven!   Join me on Thursday September 5th for a fundraiser at  @RevBrewChicago Our campaign is made of small-dollar donors like you.   RSVP🔜 at https://t.co/8Dbtz2M38x   Cheers! 🍻🍻 #chuyforcongress https://t.co/rTmiykdnyk

Yesterday I was delighted  to be joined by family friends and neighbors for a ribbon cutting ceremony for our second Congressional constituent service office. The new service office is located in Brighton Park at 4376 S Archer--the cornerstone to the southwest side. https://t.co/gTQCf5WtND
Mayor @LightfootForChi driving the point that INTEGRITY in municipal government will become a reality in Chicago! #LetThereBeLight #ShineOnChicago #BringintheLight https://t.co/NKQPby9nna

Celebrating @RepSchakowsky’s 18th Annual Ultimate Women’s Power Lunch feat. Speaker of the House @TeamPelosi! Fortunate to work alongside fearless women that inspire all of us to work towards a better country. #PowerLunch #FutureisFemale https://t.co/mBgGRmwMyl

Congratulations to Mayor-elect @LightfootForChi on her historic victory as the next Mayor of Chicago! Chicagoans spoke yesterday and they are ready for a new and progressive Chicago. I look forward to bring in the light and transform our communities with our next Mayor! #Chicago https://t.co/iNqFIdLdcL
